original_text: Then all the workers who had special skills stopped doing their work. They left their work on the tabernacle and they went to speak to Moses.
korean_text: 성소의 모든 일을 하는 지혜로운 자들이 각기 하는 일을 중지하고 와서

sentences.original_text: Then all the workers who had special skills
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 특별한 기술을 가진 모든 일꾼들이

sentences.original_text: They left their work on the tabernacle
and they went to speak to Moses
